name: JellyPin
description: Allows users to authenticate using a 4-digit PIN for quick access. Administrators can set and manage user PINs through the web interface.

versions.changelog: Admin restriction enforced, configuration saving fixed, build issues resolved

Renamed to JellyPin (was PIN Login)
- 4-digit PIN authentication
- Admin PIN management interface
- Rate limiting and lockout protection
- SHA256 PIN hashing
- Support for all Jellyfin clients
- Fixed configuration page for Jellyfin 10.11+

Fixed: Added ExcludeAssets to package references for proper plugin registration
- 4-digit PIN authentication
- Admin PIN management interface
- Rate limiting and lockout protection
- SHA256 PIN hashing
- Support for all Jellyfin clients

Initial release:
- 4-digit PIN authentication
- Admin PIN management interface
- Rate limiting and lockout protection
- SHA256 PIN hashing
- Support for all Jellyfin clients
